body.head: for introductory to Mem of War for Dem Vistas
body.ab:
—make the point ☞ —that the four or five Years the War strongly illustrated what every year of the peaceful life of
These States America
had before & still has quietly illustrated, that the heroism & best points & wit of The States, are not to be looked for as in other Lands, & in all the past, resident in special Eminences of rulers or leaders or any exceptional
persons chieftains
or rallying-points of persons whatever—but the heroism of the United States resides in the good fair broad, limitless, average mass of the cCommon People, in the county as well as city, & in
